name: Spacezone
description:
SPACEZONE Travel as far as you get in an unkown universe.   Be careful on your journey through the space there could be Obstacles on your way.   How to Play
  • Get the highest Score (100 is mine on dev mode )
  • There are three different Power Ups in the Game
  • There are five different  difficulties.
    • Easy
    • Middle
    •  Hard
    • Dev  
      • Its the intendet difficult

Controlls

W - UP

S - Down

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

If you want you can play it with a controller.

It´s my first game, i ever made. I hope you enjoy it. 

It´s an endless runner. Alot of the stuff is hand made. The Spaceship (exept for the particel effects),  Astroids and the background Music are all free assets from the internet or the unity asset store.

If you want to support me than follow me on Twitter. https://twitter.com/JDevnetic
